welcome.text: Welcome to Suraksha! We are a peer-to-peer support network.  For more information, type 0. अलग भाषा के लिए, 1 दबाएँ

location.text:
Please provide your location so we can personalize our services. Type the first 3 letters of your city. Eg. for Delhi, type DEL 
\Type the number that matches your city:

description.text: Please provide a short description about yourself and your request. Keep it to 300 characters, 0) next

sent.text: Thanks! Your request has been sent. We'll send you an update once someone responds to your request. In the meantime, here are some resources to access: 0) next
